mapper.select: SELECT a.article_id, a.article_title, d.username AS article_author, b.category_name AS article_category, a.article_time,a.article_content FROM t_article AS a, t_category AS b, t_user_login AS d WHERE a.article_author_id = d.id AND a.article_category_id = b.category_id LIMIT #{offset},#{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_article( article_title, article_author_id, article_category_id, article_time,article_content) VALUES( #{articleEnitiy.articleTitle}, #{articleEnitiy.articleAuthorID}, #{articleEnitiy.articleCategoryID}, #{articleEnitiy.articleTime}, #{articleEnitiy.articleContent})
